Article Title: Aakash Chopra mocks Sahibzada Farhan: 'Jasprit Bumrah ko chhakka maarna itna aasaan nahi hota' - WATCH
Article Text:
Sahibzada Farhan and Jasprit Bumrah (Image credit: Agencies)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Inside a champion’s mind | ft. Shafali, Deepti and Saiyami | TOI’s Ideas for India

NEW DELHI: India started their T20 series against South Africa on a dominating note, thrashing the visitors by 101 runs in the first T20I at Cuttack. Batting first, India posted a competitive 175 for six in 20 overs, with Hardik Pandya ’s blistering 59* off just 28 balls, studded with six fours and four sixes, leading the charge. Tilak Varma (26 off 32) and Axar Patel (23 off 21) also made valuable contributions, while Jitesh Sharma remained unbeaten on 10 off five balls.In reply, South Africa never looked in control and were bowled out for 74 in 12.3 overs. Dewald Brevis offered some resistance with 22 runs, but the Indian bowling unit, led by Arshdeep Singh, Jasprit Bumrah , Varun Chakravarthy, and Axar Patel, dismantled the opposition, each picking up two wickets. Hardik and Shivam Dube claimed one each. The all-round performance earned Hardik the Player of the Match award, as India took a 1-0 lead in the five-match series.However, more attention than the match itself has been drawn to former India cricketer and commentator Aakash Chopra , who took playful pot shots at Pakistan opener Sahibzada Farhan .During South Africa’s innings, when the team were 28/2 in the fourth over, Bumrah bowled a good-length delivery on the last ball after Aiden Markram had smashed a six.Commentating at the time, Chopra said, “Bumrah ko chhakka maarna itna aasaan nahi hota. Kabhi lag jaaye to kuch log documentary bana lete hain [It’s not so easy to hit Bumrah for a six. If someone manages to do it once, some people even make a documentary on it].”Watch the video here The remark, delivered without naming anyone, clearly referenced Sahibzada Farhan, who had hit Bumrah for sixes during the Asia Cup T20 2025.Farhan had even shared a clip of a documentary made on his innings after Pakistan lost to India in the final, making him a target for Chopra’s humorous dig.The commentary clip has gone viral, with fans praising Chopra’s wit.The second T20I between India and South Africa will be played on December 11 in Mullanpur.
Article Summary: India beat south africa by 101 runs in the first t20i at cuttack. Hardik pandya scored 59 off 28 balls, studded with six fours and four sixes. South africa were bowled out for 74 in 12.3 overs. Former india cricketer aakash chopra took playful pot shots at pakistan opener sahibzada farhan.

Article Title: 'Will not accept': Shashi Tharoor declines 'Veer Savarkar Award'; here's what he said
Article Text:
Shashi Tharoor Refuses Savarkar Award After Organisers Announce His Name Without Confirmation

NEW DELHI: Congress MP Shashi Tharoor on Wednesday declined to accept the 'Veer Savarkar Award', calling the organisers "irresponsible" for announcing his name without him having agreed to receive it.Tharoor was named among the first winners of the newly instituted Veer Savarkar International Impact Award 2025, to be presented by Highrange Rural Development Society India."I have come to know from media reports that I have been named a recipient of the "Veer Savarkar Award," which is to be presented today in Delhi. I only learned about this announcement yesterday in Kerala, where I had gone to vote in the local self-government elections. There in Thiruvananthapuram , responding to media queries, I had clarified that I was neither aware of, nor had accepted, such an award and it was irresponsible on the part of the organisers to announce my name without my having agreed to receive it," the Thiruvananthapuram MP said in a post on X."Despite that, today in Delhi, some media outlets continue to ask the same question. Therefore, I am issuing this statement to clarify the matter unequivocally. In the absence of clarifications about the nature of the award, the organization presenting it or any other contextual details, the question of my attending the event today or accepting the award does not arise," he added.After Tharoor’s remarks, Aji Krishnan, secretary of the HRDS India said that the Congress MP had been notified about it well ahead of time, PTI reported citing a TV channel.He added that HRDS India representatives and the jury chair had visited Tharoor at his home to extend the invitation, during which the MP requested a list of the other awardees.Kerala law minister P Rajeev had said that the choice to accept or decline the award rested entirely with Tharoor.
Article Summary: Shashi tharoor refuses savarkar award after organisers announce his name without confirmation. Congress mp calls the organisers "irresponsible" for announcing his name without him having agreed to receive it. Thiruvananthapuram mp only learned about this announcement yesterday in kerala, where he had gone to vote in local self-government elections.

Article Title: Serena Williams and Venus Williams combined net worth in 2025: Tennis sisters, earnings, endorsements, business, career and more
Article Text:
Serena Williams and Venus Williams combined net worth in 2025: Tennis sisters, earnings, endorsements, business, career and more (Image via Getty)

Serena Williams and Venus Williams net worth in 2025

Serena Williams tennis earnings and prize money

Venus Williams tennis earnings and prize money

Serena Williams endorsements and business work

Venus Williams endorsements and business work

Serena Williams and Venus Williams are two of the most famous sisters in sports. They are great tennis players and also very strong businesswomen. In 2025, trusted reports say Serena’s net worth is about 350 million dollars, and Venus’s net worth is about 90–95 million dollars. This means their combined net worth is around 440–445 million dollars. They make money from tennis, brand deals, business work, and smart investments. They stay very active even after many years in the sport.Forbes lists Serena Williams with a net worth of about 350 million dollars in 2025. This comes from her prize money, big brand deals, and her investment company.Business Insider reports that Venus Williams is worth 90–95 million dollars. When we put the numbers together, the sisters are worth 440–445 million dollars, making them one of the richest sister teams in world sports.Serena Williams won 23 Grand Slam singles titles, the most in modern women’s tennis. The WTA confirms she earned about 94.8 million dollars in prize money, which is the highest amount ever for a woman tennis player.Her long run at the top of the sport helped her build a very strong financial base that still grows today through her businesses.According to the WTA, Venus Williams has earned around 42 million dollars in prize money during her more than 30-year tennis career. She won 7 Grand Slam singles titles and many more in doubles with Serena. Her long time in the sport helped her earn steady money and build her own business path.Serena Williams has worked with Nike, Gatorade, Wilson, Rolex, Beats by Dre, and many more big brands. In 2025, she became a global ambassador for Ro, a major health company, which Ro confirmed on its official site.Serena also runs Serena Ventures, which has invested in 70–85 startups, including several unicorns worth more than 1 billion dollars. She also launched WYN Beauty and has a small stake in the new WNBA team in Toronto.Venus Williams has worked with brands like Nike, Gatorade, Wilson, and Porsche. She owns the activewear brand EleVen and her interior design company V Starr. Reports say these brands bring in strong money each year for her, adding to the massive wealth.In 2025, the tennis sisters duo also worked on a new video podcast set to release on X, giving fans a new way to see them together.Also Read: Aryna Sabalenka and Georgios Frangulis combined net worth: Tennis earnings, endorsements, business, relationship and more
Article Summary: Serena williams and venus williams are two of the most famous sisters in sports. They are great tennis players and also very strong businesswomen. In 2025, trusted reports say serena’s net worth is about 350 million dollars. This means their combined net worth is around 440–445 million dollars, making them one of the richest sister teams in world sports.

Article Title: Pete Alonso net worth in 2025: Baltimore Orioles contract, MLB endorsements, career journey, and exit from Mets
Article Text:
Pete Alonso net worth in 2025: Baltimore Orioles contract, MLB endorsements, career journey, and exit from Mets (Image Via Getty)







Pete Alonso: Net worth comes from strong MLB salaries

Pete Alonso: Endorsement deals add steady off-field income



Pete Alonso: MLB journey and contract path after Mets exit

Pete Alonso: Current status with Baltimore Orioles in 2025

Pete Alonso ranks among the most well-known power hitters in Major League Baseball. Popularly called the “Polar Bear,” the slugging first baseman built his reputation on home runs and durability. After spending his entire early career with the New York Mets, Alonso started a new chapter in early 2025. He is now with the Baltimore Orioles, a move that quickly became one of the biggest talking points of the MLB offseason.Pete Alonso's net worth is projected to be around $25 million in 2025. MLB contracts he negotiated throughout his early years with the New York Mets provide most of his income.Arbitration allowed Alonso to obtain multiple high-value one-year contracts, for a total of six years in New York.Alonso had a $20.5 million salary for the 2024 season, and was again among the highest-paid first basemen in 2024, choosing not to accept arbitration.Yearly increases in his market value, combined with his ability to consistently remain healthy and productive, positioned him for a substantial contract adjustment during free agency.Pete Alonso has developed a strong endorsement outside of baseball. Nike, Rawlings, Fanatics, Topps, and Big League Among the companies he cooperates with are chew.Baseball gear, trading cards, and fan goods dominate most of these contracts.Alonso's public image, power-hitting style, and Home Run appeal to sponsors. Winning in Derby. Although endorsements provide consistent yearly income and help to maintain his brand among MLB fans, they bring in less money than his playing salary.The New York Mets drafted Pete Alonso in 2016 out of the University of Florida. He made his MLB debut in 2019 and made instant history. Alonso smashed 53 home runs as a rookie, setting an MLB rookie record and winning National League Rookie of the Year.He later became a four-time All-Star and a multiple-time Home Run Derby champion. Despite several contract talks, Alonso and the Mets never agreed on a long-term extension. That led to his decision to test free agency after the 2024 season.Pete Alonso signed a long-term contract with the Baltimore Orioles in early 2025, officially ending his long run with the Mets. The Orioles view Alonso as a key middle-of-the-order bat and a leader for their roster.Before hitting free agency, Alonso once again crossed the 40-home-run mark in 2024, proving his power had not slowed. Team officials and league insiders have confirmed that Baltimore sees Alonso as a central part of their future plans heading into the upcoming MLB season.Also Read: MLB Trade Rumors: Alex Bregman Race Puts Bo Bichette In Play As Blue Jays Eye Tatsuya Imai
Article Summary: Pete alonso's net worth is projected to be around $25 million in 2025. Mlb contracts he negotiated throughout his early years with the new york mets provide most of his income. Nike, rawlings, fanatics, topps, and big league are among the companies he cooperates with.

Article Title: Sidney Crosby’s future ignites debate after anonymous poll exposes three teams players secretly expect him to play for next
Article Text:
Sidney Crosby’s future (Imagn Images)

Top teams Sidney Crosby could play for next



Hockey fans love a good mystery, and few topics stir more curiosity than Sidney Crosby’s future. A new anonymous poll among NHL players has given that conversation fresh life. The answers reveal a clear theme. While the league changes fast, most players still believe Crosby will choose stability over spectacle. The poll, conducted by The Athletic with 120 participants, asked players where they think Crosby will play next. The responses hint at loyalty, superstition, and admiration that stretch far beyond Pittsburgh.The numbers lean heavily toward one conclusion. Nearly every player believes Crosby is still tied to the city he has called home since his first NHL shift. A non-Penguins player summed it up by saying, "He's been a Penguin for all his career. Riding it out and playing all his years there, that would be a special moment for him." That sentiment echoed again and again, building a picture of a superstar whose identity feels inseparable from his team.Players described Crosby with words that paint him as someone who values routine and long-term bonds. One said, "I think he's a pretty loyal (guy) and seems like a guy who's going to spend his whole career in one place."Another added that even though legends sometimes finish their careers elsewhere, Crosby’s steady nature makes him different. Some pointed to his habits, saying he “seems like a pretty superstitious guy,” which only strengthened their belief that he won’t pack up and move.Others made their opinions even more direct. "I think Crosby is a Pen for life. I can't see him anywhere else." Another added, "I think he's extremely loyal." One more said, «I think he finishes (his career) off in Pittsburgh.» A player even joked about his production with, "And he'll probably score 100 points again. That seems like his going rate." The idea that Pittsburgh would let him go felt unthinkable to some. "They're not going to let him walk. They'd lose too many fans."Still, the poll revealed two other teams that players see as realistic possibilities. Montreal came in second, a nod to Eastern Canadian roots and childhood fandoms. One player explained, "If you grow up in Eastern Canada, you grow up a Habs fan, right? Just seems like Montreal would be an option." Another admitted, "I don't think Crosby will ever leave. But it would be Montreal if he did."Colorado finished close behind, fueled by the idea of Crosby joining his close friend Nathan MacKinnon. As one player said, “To play with (Nathan) MacKinnon.” Another added that wherever Crosby ends up, he hopes "it's a contender."In the final tally, Pittsburgh earned 73.7 percent of the votes, Montreal 12.7 percent, and Colorado 11.9 percent. The results show how much respect Crosby holds in every dressing room. His future remains uncertain, yet the fascination around it remains one of the NHL’s most compelling storylines.Also Read: NHL Trade Rumors: Quinn Hughes emerges as a stunning Penguins target as blockbuster deadline possibilities heat up again
Article Summary: Sidney crosby's future remains one of the nhl's most compelling storylines. A new anonymous poll among nhl players has given that conversation fresh life. The responses hint at loyalty, superstition, and admiration that stretch far beyond pittsburgh. Pittsburgh earned 73.7 percent of the votes.

Article Title: “I've wanted to punch them”: Stephen Curry’s wife Ayesha Curry opens up about the anger she feels when women try to pursue the NBA legend
Article Text:
Ayesha Curry opens up about women approaching Stephen Curry.(Image via Elsa/Getty Images)

Stephen Curry’s wife, Ayesha Curry, shares how she acts when women approach the star player





Stephen Curry’s wife, Ayesha Curry, blamed the show for the criticisms she had received over her comments





Stephen Curry, the Golden State Warriors’ star player, has been with his wife, Ayesha Curry , even before he was drafted in the NBA.While Stephen Curry is pretty private, Ayesha Curry is more public about the things that happen in her life. The popular entrepreneur had opened up about what she feels when women approach Stephen Curry.A few years ago, in 2019, Ayesha Curry appeared on the now cancelled, Jada Pinkett Smith‘s show, Red Table Talk, where she opened up about women approaching Stephen Curry.Stephen Curry’s wife, Ayesha Curry, said, "But there have been a couple of times, where I've wanted to punch somebody in the face for sure…”The popular entrepreneur added, “He can't see it coming, I see it from a mile away."Stephen Curry’s wife, Ayesha Curry, continued, "Stephen is very nice by nature…Everything is always very friendly, sometimes to the point where, 'I'm a grown woman,' so, I'll just insert myself and be like, 'Hello, how are you doing?'"She added that "the ladies will always be lurking, hoping for their moment and waiting."However, despite the fame and wealth, Stephen Curry has always remained deeply in love and committed to his wife, Ayesha Curry, and their beautiful children.Some of Ayesha Curry’s statements in the the now cancelled, Jada Pinkett Smith‘s show, Red Table Talk, had raised eyebrows then.In 2023, Stephen Curry’s wife, Ayesha Curry, opened up about the criticisms she had received for her comments and blamed Jada Pinkett Smith‘s show, Red Table Talk, for it.Ayesha Curry spoke to Business Insider about it and said, “It’s not what I said, and the context was weird…Yeah. I took that one personally.”The popular entrepreneur added, “When the social media thing started, nobody knew what that was going to become…If we had known back in the day just how chaotic it would make life, I don’t think we would’ve done it.”However, Ayesha Curry did not blame Jada Pinkett Smith directly for the outrage her comments had received and continues to be friendly with her today, while Stephen Curry has stayed away from the drama.Also Read: "Shattered my soul": Dwyane Wade's wife Gabrielle Union breaks silence on infertility struggles while the NBA legend had a child during their split
Article Summary: Ayesha curry opens up about women approaching stephen curry. The popular entrepreneur had opened up about what she feels when women approach the star player. She blamed the show, red table talk, for the criticisms she had received over her comments. However, ayesha did not blame jada pinkett smith directly for the outrage.

Article Title: NHL Trade Rumors: Quinn Hughes emerges as a stunning Penguins target as blockbuster deadline possibilities heat up again
Article Text:
Quinn Hughes trade rumors (Getty Images)

Could Quinn Hughes be the missing piece for the Penguins as fresh reports tie him to a blockbuster deadline move?





The talk around Quinn Hughes has taken a sharp turn tonight as the Pittsburgh Penguins have suddenly entered the conversation with real weight. The idea of Hughes leaving Vancouver has been simmering for weeks, but this new twist has pulled fresh eyes onto a saga that already had fans and analysts buzzing. Instead of slowing down, the story keeps gathering speed, and the timing could not be more dramatic with the season settling into its rhythm.What once looked like a simple list of suitors now appears more complex after a report connected Kyle Dubas and the Penguins to the superstar defenseman. Elliotte Friedman mentioned Pittsburgh as a team to watch, and that hint alone has sent the hockey world scrambling. The possibility of Hughes landing in a city hungry for another championship has added a new layer to a developing storyline.The Penguins have played with a sense of purpose this season, and their strong start has created real belief that the window for another Stanley Cup is still open. That urgency has fueled talk that management might swing big. If the team plans to give Sidney Crosby and Evgeni Malkin one more deep run, Hughes would be a dream fit. His elite skating and playmaking could lift an already determined roster into a true contender.Friedman suggested that Dubas is ready to push hard to make a deal. Pittsburgh holds a deep prospect pool and future first round picks that could help the Canucks begin a full rebuild. For Vancouver, a partner willing to offer both high-end youth and long-term draft capital would be difficult to dismiss, especially if they choose to reset their direction.The real test lies in whether Hughes is open to signing long term in Pittsburgh. If he prefers a different landing spot, Dubas would need to consider the risk of acquiring him as a rental player. That uncertainty will shape how aggressive the Penguins become as the deadline approaches.With the New Jersey Devils still seen as a major contender because of the family ties, Pittsburgh’s late entry has changed the tone of the race. The final stretch will reveal whether the Penguins can turn interest into a blockbuster move worthy of the spotlight.Also Read: “I look for transparency, but...": Billionaire owner Michael Andlauer opens up with surprising honesty about Brady Tkachuk tampering saga
Article Summary: Vancouver canucks defenseman quinn hughes has been linked to the pittsburgh penguins. Elliotte friedman suggested that dubas is ready to push hard to make a deal. Pittsburgh holds a deep prospect pool and future first round picks that could help the canucks begin a full rebuild.

Article Title: "Paul, propose already": Fans erupt as Livvy Dunne’s new photo carousel takes over Instagram
Article Text:
Paul Skenes and Livvy Dunne (Image credit: Cooper Neill/MLB Photos via Getty)

Fans crowded Livvy Dunne's comments with praise, jokes and playful messages for Paul Skenes after her latest photos went viral

Livvy Dunne did not need a caption to get people talking. The LSU star shared a new set of monochrome photos that immediately drew thousands to her page, and within minutes the real action shifted to the comment section. The pictures were striking, but the reactions beneath them carried an energy of their own, almost as if her followers had been waiting for an excuse to celebrate her again.What followed felt spontaneous and lively. People kept dropping comments at a pace that made the thread feel like a running conversation. Some admired the photos. Some joked with each other. Many circled back just to see what new reactions had appeared. The mood was light and familiar, the kind of rhythm that only happens when an audience feels closely connected to the person posting.The first comment to gain traction came from a fan who wrote, "OMG Paul what are you waiting for! PROPOSE ALREADY". It struck a nerve instantly. Many others jumped in after that, tagging Paul Skenes as if he were part of the conversation. Some fans joked that he was probably staring at his phone in silence, unsure what to say after seeing the photos.The thread slowly shifted toward him without anyone planning it. Before long, the comments looked less like reactions to a post and more like a group of people playfully nudging the Pirates pitcher to respond.As the jokes continued, another wave of reactions followed. One admirer wrote, "The finest woman that ever did live!!", which sparked its own stream of replies. Someone else chimed in with, "2 is becoming my lock screen", pointing to the slide that many considered the highlight of the carousel. A fan added, "Girl, YES!! So beautiful and just AWESOME!!", echoing what plenty of followers felt after seeing the images.The reactions were easygoing and honest, the kind of comments people leave when they feel comfortable on a page. As more people joined in, the thread started to move on its own. The photos drew everyone there, but the fans kept the conversation going and turned the post into a fun back-and-forth.Also read: Kike Hernandez’s bold five word warning turns Edwin Diaz’s Dodgers signing into a viral offseason moment
Article Summary: Livvy dunne shared a new set of monochrome photos that immediately drew thousands to her page. The pictures were striking, but the reactions beneath them carried an energy of their own. People kept dropping comments at a pace that made the thread feel like a running conversation.

Article Title: Brittany Mahomes abruptly goes silent after Mahomes and Kelce’s meltdown shakes Chiefs’ season
Article Text:
Kansas City Chiefs faced a tough loss against the Houston Texans. Quarterback Patrick Mahomes and player Travis Kelce struggled on the field. Brittany Mahomes, wife of Patrick Mahomes, remained silent on social media after the game. This quiet response mirrored the disappointment felt by many fans. The team's playoff hopes are now uncertain.

Kelce struggles, Mahomes takes heat, and Brittany distances herself from the chaos

Brittany Mahomes has never been shy about showing love for the Kansas City Chiefs, especially when her husband Patrick Mahomes takes the field at Arrowhead Stadium. From stadium arrivals to postgame celebrations, her Instagram is often filled with glam snapshots, family moments, and behind-the-scenes excitement. But Sunday’s matchup against the Houston Texans brought a different kind of energy and this time Britney chose not to post at all.After the Chiefs’ 20–10 defeat, the atmosphere among fans turned tense, and the blame quickly fell on both Patrick Mahomes and Travis Kelce for their lackluster performance. Instead of sharing her usual reactions, Brittany Mahomes went silent, leaving fans to interpret her disappointment without a word.Before kickoff, Brittany Mahomes seemed poised for another enthusiastic game day, sharing Instagram stories of the stadium buzz. Yet as the game unfolded, Kansas City Chiefs faltered early and never recovered. Kelce dropped late-game opportunities and the offense struggled to find rhythm, a shock to a fan base accustomed to polished comebacks. Once the loss was sealed, Brittany’s social feed suddenly stopped.No postgame thoughts. No family shots. Just silence.This isn’t the first time her online presence has mirrored the team’s emotional highs and lows. When the Chiefs win, Brittany often floods social media with celebration. But when they lose, fans get nothing at all, a silent statement that speaks louder than her usual hype. Making the night even more unusual, she also wasn’t seen alongside Taylor Swift and Selena Gomez, who attended separately in support of Travis Kelce.With this defeat, Kansas City Chiefs suffers more than a bruised ego. Their playoff hopes are now hanging by a thread, and for the first time in nine seasons, they’ve lost the AFC West crown, a title now held by the Denver Broncos. Their next game against the Chargers could determine whether their season lives or dies.As frustration among supporters rises, Brittany’s silence reflects what many Chiefs fans are feeling: uncertainty. The once-unstoppable dynasty suddenly looks fragile, and if Mahomes and Kelce don’t turn things around fast, the quiet moment on Brittany’s Instagram may be the least of Kansas City’s worries.Also Read: Brittany Mahomes sends a clear message to fans as they question Patrick Mahomes’ legacy during tough season
Article Summary: Brittany mahomes has never been shy about showing love for the kansas city chiefs. Her instagram is often filled with glam snapshots, family moments, and behind-the-scenes excitement. But this time britney chose not to post at all. This quiet response mirrored the disappointment felt by many fans.

Article Title: Philip Rivers’ week 15 status takes center stage as Colts turn to veteran QB after Daniel Jones’ injury
Article Text:
Philip Rivers’ status for week 15 (Image via: Getty Images)

Philip Rivers’ week 15 status: Will the Colts start the 44-year-old QB in Seattle?



The Indianapolis Colts have shocked the NFL by pulling 44-year-old Philip Rivers out of retirement after Daniel Jones went down with a season-ending Achilles injury. With the playoff race tightening and stability at quarterback slipping away, the Colts turned to a trusted veteran who already proved he can win in Indianapolis. Suddenly, Rivers is back in the building and potentially days away from returning to action.The biggest question heading into Week 15 is whether the former Pro Bowler will suit up against the Seattle Seahawks. Making a comeback at this stage of the season is rare, but the Colts’ situation might demand it. With a playoff berth still within reach, Indianapolis is evaluating just how quickly Rivers can get up to game speed.Rivers completed a private workout shortly after the Colts’ Week 14 loss to the Jacksonville Jaguars, and the front office liked what they saw. Impressed by his conditioning and familiarity with the system, the team signed him to the practice squad on Tuesday. Now, all attention turns toward how ready he is to take the field and whether he could start as soon as Sunday.As the team ramps up preparations for the Seahawks, the Colts continue to monitor everything from Rivers’ timing to his ability to re-adjust to NFL tempo.While nothing has been finalized, Indianapolis has made it clear they won’t hesitate to activate him if he proves capable of running the offense.Adding to the nostalgia of his return, Rivers will also reclaim his old jersey number. With Daniel Jones on injured reserve, the veteran quarterback will once again wear No. 17, the number he’s proudly represented throughout his entire career.Rivers’ history with Indianapolis gives him a strong head start. During his 2020 season with the Colts, he delivered steady and efficient play, completing 68% of his passes for 4,169 yards, 24 touchdowns, and 11 interceptions. That performance propelled the team to an 11-5 finish and a playoff berth, ending in a narrow Wild Card loss to the Buffalo Bills before Rivers announced his retirement.Now, nearly five years later, Indianapolis is hoping his leadership and precision can once again bring stability at the most crucial point of the season. Whether he starts in Week 15 or soon after, Rivers’ comeback adds a dramatic twist to the Colts’ playoff push, and all eyes will be on Seattle to see if the veteran’s return becomes reality this Sunday.Also Read: Philip Rivers returns to NFL at 44 to join Indianapolis Colts amid quarterback shortage, reveals NFL insider
Article Summary: Indianapolis colts signed 44-year-old philip rivers out of retirement on tuesday. Colts quarterback daniel jones went down with a season-ending achilles injury. Rivers completed a private workout shortly after the colts’ week 14 loss to the jacksonville jaguars.

Article Title: Inside the fairytale life George Springer shares with his wife Charlise Castro who built her own path before the spotlight
Article Text:
George Springer with his wife Charlise Castro (Image via: IG/X)

How Charlise Castro shaped her own career rather than being just a baseball wife

How George Springer and Charlise Castro's relationship grew through hard work and understanding

Charlise Castro’s life shows how identity and love can coexist for sports families

Charlise Castro’s life story reads far beyond the tag of being married to Toronto Blue Jays right fielder George Springer. She was a college standout long before she walked down the aisle, earning respect for her talent in softball and her later success in the wellness field. Her journey offers a look at how partners of elite athletes build their own paths while living in a world dominated by bright stadium lights and constant attention. Castro’s growth reflects ambition, resilience, and a firm belief that her identity deserves its own spotlight.Castro’s athletic journey began at the University at Albany where her strength at the plate turned her into a force in Division I softball. Her scholarship was earned, her achievements were celebrated, and her award as America East Player of the Year stamped her influence as one of the best young hitters in the country. Her selection to Puerto Rico’s national team only elevated her visibility, showing she could compete internationally. Yet her switch from professional play to personal development shows how she values reinvention over comfort.After graduating, Castro chose personal growth over lingering nostalgia for sport. She earned an MBA from the University of Saint Rose, taking her knowledge from the field into classrooms and business settings.That shift positioned her for a career in health, fitness, and wellness coaching where she could help others find confidence and balance. Her evolution showcases how athletes can turn discipline into leadership and passion into service.Castro has developed a quiet but credible space in the wellness world where she blends her business skills with lived athletic experience. Instead of promoting glamour without substance, she uses her platform to guide people toward stronger lifestyles. Even with Springer’s fame attracting followers, Castro’s work stands on its own credibility, supported by years of sport and education. She projects independence in a world where athlete spouses are often expected to stand behind.Castro first met Springer in 2011 when both were student athletes determining their futures. They bonded over long training days, competitive pressure, and goals that required sacrifice and patience. When Springer chased the majors, Castro chased academic achievement, creating parallel pursuits rather than one supporting role. Their connection deepened through understanding rather than dependency.The couple married in January 2018 in Newport Beach, California, in a setting suitable for two people balancing spotlight and family. The years since brought travel, clubhouse life, new homes, and eventually parenthood as they welcomed two children into the fold. Castro’s ability to nurture home life while working shows how she and Springer operate as a team, not as celebrity center and shadow. Their relationship reflects mutual ambition wrapped in family values.Today, Castro represents the changing narrative of partners in professional sports where wives create personal value instead of standing as silent figures on camera. Her athletic roots, career achievements, and steady role in Springer’s life make her part of his story without being overshadowed by it. Her journey is a reminder that balanced relationships in sports are built on choice, effort, and equal dreams. For George Springer, she remains his biggest supporter but also his truest match in drive and determination. Their story reminds everyone that shared ambition can build a lasting bond. It shows how two people can grow stronger when they move forward with the same purpose. It is this quiet understanding that makes their bond feel real and enduring always. And because of this, their relationship feels strong even in the toughest seasons together.Also read: Freddie Freeman and Ryan Reynolds’ SickKids video goes viral as fans explode with hilarious reactions online
Article Summary: Charlise castro is the wife of toronto blue jays right fielder george springer. She was a college standout in softball and later moved into the wellness field. Castro’s growth reflects ambition, resilience, and a firm belief that her identity deserves its own spotlight.

Article Title: Philip Rivers admits his wife is ‘nervous’ as the 44-year-old eyes dramatic NFL return: "You expect any wife to..."
Article Text:
Philip Rivers reveals his wife’s ‘nervous’ reaction to his unexpected NFL comeback

Philip Rivers return sparks family excitement and concern



Philip Rivers Media Availability : Dec 10

Philip Rivers stepped back into the NFL spotlight this week, carrying the same competitive spark he once showed on Sundays. The difference today is the weight of time. The longtime quarterback, who recently celebrated becoming a grandfather, now prepares for a potential return with the Indianapolis Colts at 44. While fans view his comeback as a feel-good twist to a turbulent season, those closest to him feel the intensity of what lies ahead. His wife Tiffany senses the physical reality of the league he once commanded with ease.Rivers spoke with an honest tone as he fielded questions about the surprise signing. His words made it clear that football instincts never fade, but life off the field can shift priorities. The excitement inside his home mixes with nerves, especially for Tiffany, who has lived through every high and low of his career.Rivers, now on the Colts practice squad after Daniel Jones’ injury on Dec. 7, addressed the tension his return brings. He said, "My wife has been my biggest fan the whole time I played, and she's nervous about the physical aspect of it, as you expect any wife to." He later explained that injuries were always part of the job. "I mean, for 250 games or whatever it was, that was a risk, as you see every week." He added, "Whether you're 24 in the best shape, or you're 44 and not so sure.Anything can happen."Despite the unpredictable nature of the sport, Rivers told reporters that fear never controlled him. "That has never been a concern of mine," he said. His mindset remains steady. "Dudes are big and fast, just like they were, so I'm just taking it one day at a time." He joked that if he did get hurt, "I'd have a long time to recover."His children, who range from toddlers to adults, are pushing him on with enthusiasm. Some barely remember his Chargers days. Rivers shared, "My six-year-old asked, 'Dad, why don't you play anymore?'" His sons, he said, are "fired up" but still ask, "'Dad, do you think you can do it?'"Rivers insisted he retired peacefully after 2021 and enjoyed coaching at St. Michael Catholic High School, but the competitive fire lingered. "I didn't walk away because I felt like I was done," he said.Whether he takes the field in Seattle this Sunday will depend on how the week unfolds. For now, Rivers continues to prepare, balancing family nerves with a veteran’s calm as he steps toward an NFL return no one saw coming.Also Read: Colts owner Carlie Irsay-Gordon steps out in bold fit as she evaluates 44-year-old Philip Rivers on the field
Article Summary: Philip rivers reveals his wife’s ‘nervous’ reaction to his unexpected nfl comeback. The excitement inside his home mixes with nerves, especially for tiffany. His children, who range from toddlers to adults, are pushing him on with enthusiasm.

Article Title: Colts owner Carlie Irsay-Gordon steps out in bold fit as she evaluates 44-year-old Philip Rivers on the field
Article Text:
Colts owner Carlie Irsay-Gordon (Getty Images)

Carlie Irsay-Gordon and the Colts quarterback shake-up



The Indianapolis Colts walked into December looking like the feel-good surprise of the season. Now the mood around the team has shifted as three straight losses and the season-ending injury to quarterback Daniel Jones have forced a dramatic move. The sight of 44-year-old Phillip Rivers stepping back onto an NFL practice field created a swirl of curiosity. What made it more striking was team owner Carlie Irsay-Gordon standing on the sideline in an all-black outfit, watching every throw like someone determined to reshape her team’s fate.Rivers has not played since January 9, 2021, when the Colts lost a Wild Card game to the Buffalo Bills. He stepped away to focus on his family and help raise his ten kids while coaching high school football in Alabama. Seeing him back in a Colts helmet felt both nostalgic and surreal, but given the chaos at quarterback, it also made sense.The Colts have reached a point where they need solutions fast. Both Riley Leonard and Anthony Richardson are hurt, leaving the roster scrambling for stability. Rivers already knows Shane Steichen and the offensive system, so he was only a phone call away. The team signed him to the practice squad to evaluate him, and early signs show he still throws with the rhythm and power that once carried him past 60,000 yards and 400 touchdowns.His return became even more of a story when Irsay-Gordon arrived at practice in black gear with commando-style boots, almost like she was on her own scouting mission. Her presence was not for show. She has a reputation for being involved in every layer of football operations. She is also known for a line that people around the team still talk about. She once said she listens to play calls to learn where the team can improve, calling it a “scary micromanaging quote. ”At 45, the daughter of the late Jim Irsay has found her own leadership style. Fashion may get her noticed, but decisions like bringing in Rivers define her influence. If he takes the field Sunday against the Seattle Seahawks, the attention will shift from her outfit to the veteran quarterback who might get one more chance to save a season.Also Read: "Off-balance and out of rhythm": Is Patrick Mahomes the reason behind Chiefs' struggle? Skip Bayless has a point about him
Article Summary: Colts owner carlie irsay-gordon watched her team practice in all-black. Phillip rivers has not played since january 9, 2021, when the colts lost a wild card game to the buffalo bills. He stepped away to focus on his family and help raise his ten kids while coaching high school football.

Article Title: Madison Beer opens up about past suicide attempts while finding stability in her relationship with Justin Herbert
Article Text:
Singer Madison Beer bravely shared her teenage trauma of leaked private photos, which led to suicidal thoughts and attempts. She revealed on Call Her Daddy that her current relationship with NFL star Justin Herbert offers a sense of safety and trust she's never experienced before. This newfound emotional clarity marks a significant healing journey for the artist.

Madison Beer reflects on long-standing mental health battles and how her bond with Justin Herbert feels different

Madison Beer: Blackmailed With My Nudes (Full Episode)

Madison Beer is entering a new chapter, one marked by emotional clarity, healthier relationships, and a willingness to confront the darkest moments of her past. In a powerful and vulnerable appearance on Alex Cooper’s Call Her Daddy podcast, the singer revisited the trauma she carried as a teenager when private photos of her were leaked online.The incident left her feeling isolated and exposed, fueling a belief that she “would die young” and pushing her toward two suicide attempts. Today, Madison speaks with a sense of healing she once thought she’d never reach, crediting her support system, including boyfriend and Los Angeles Chargers quarterback Justin Herbert , for helping her see life through a steadier, safer lens.During the conversation, Madison detailed the overwhelming shame and despair she felt when those images surfaced years ago. She explained that one of her attempts was directly tied to that moment, saying she had been unable to see a path forward.While she now views her life with more hope, she shared that she wishes she could go back and comfort her younger self, someone who desperately needed reassurance but had no idea how to ask for it.Her struggles, she admitted, didn’t stay confined to her teen years. Madison told Cooper that depression often seeped into her romantic relationships, leading to codependency and difficulty being alone.But something has shifted in her current relationship with Herbert. For the first time, she feels genuinely safe with a partner.She emphasized that she is with someone “who genuinely cares for her and someone she can truly trust,” a sentiment fans have noticed through their consistently low-key but supportive dynamic.Herbert, meanwhile, is navigating his own challenges on the field. Despite playing with a protected left hand following surgery, he led the Chargers to a gritty overtime win against the Eagles on December 8, helping the team secure second place in the AFC West.The quarterback’s resilience mirrors Madison’s emotional journey, two people rebuilding in different ways, yet aligned in their support for one another.Also Read: Justin Herbert and Madison Beer spark wedding buzz after ‘mother-in-law mode’ comment
Article Summary: Singer madison beer bravely shared her teenage trauma of leaked private photos, which led to suicidal thoughts and attempts. She revealed on call her daddy that her current relationship with nfl star justin herbert offers a sense of safety and trust she's never experienced before.

Article Title: Jannik Sinner victory joy grows after girlfriend Laila Hasanovic shares eye catching Christmas photos for Tommy Hilfiger
Article Text:
Jannik Sinner victory joy grows after girlfriend Laila Hasanovic shares eye catching Christmas photos for Tommy Hilfiger (Image via Getty)

Jannik Sinner thanks Laila Hasanovic after Vienna win as he talks about love and balance in tennis

Jannik Sinner’s girlfriend, Laila Hasanovic, shared new Christmas photos from her Tommy Hilfiger campaign, and fans loved the warm, bright holiday look. Laila Hasanovic wore a simple black dress for the shoot and posted the pictures on Instagram. Her post came right after Jannik Sinner finished a long and tough tennis season in Turin. He missed the Year-End No. 1 spot by a very small margin, but he still won the ATP Finals by beating Carlos Alcaraz in straight sets.The couple has been together since mid-2025 and is often seen side-by-side at tournaments and events. They were also spotted at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix last week, which made fans smile because they rarely post much about their private life. Laila Hasanovic’s new photos came at a perfect time, as Sinner’s season ended with big wins and big emotions. Now, more people are talking about both his tennis and their growing bond.Jannik Sinner first spoke openly about his relationship with Laila Hasanovic after winning the Vienna Open. In that final, he had a tough fight against Alexander Zverev. Sinner went down a break early and said the start of the match was very hard for him.But he stayed calm and pushed himself to the end. After lifting the trophy, he thanked everyone who helped him during the event.He said, “It was such a difficult start in this final for me. I went a break down, had some chances in the first set but couldn’t use them. Zverev was serving very well, but I just tried to stick there mentally and play my best tennis when it came. To everyone here, my family, my girlfriend, my friends, and my whole team watching from home, thank you so much for your support.”Laila Hasanovic also cheered for him at the ATP Finals, making the season feel even more special. As Sinner grows as a champion, he is also learning how to balance his career and his personal life.In his interview with Vanity Fair in 2024 with writer Federico Rocca, Sinner said that it is not easy to keep a strong relationship because he travels so much. He explained, “Of course, it’s not easy. I travel a lot and during tournaments I’m very focused. But I think it’s a wonderful thing when you find the right love like everyone else.”He also said that many tennis greats have had families during their best years. He said, “And then, if you think about it, the best tennis players in the world all have wives and children.”Then he added a fun little detail about himself: “I’ve never been to a nightclub. I don’t like to stay up late. I prefer playing cards with a friend.”Now, Jannik Sinner will look ahead to the 2026 Australian Open, where he will try to win his third straight title. He is expected to be the second seed in Melbourne and will face strong players like Carlos Alcaraz, Novak Djokovic , and Alexander Zverev.Also Read: Venus Williams And Andrea Preti Combined Net Worth In 2025: Tennis Legend, Career, Family, Business Income, And More
Article Summary: Jannik sinner’s girlfriend, laila hasanovic, shared new christmas photos from her tommy hilfiger campaign. The couple has been together since mid-2025 and is often seen side-by-side at tournaments and events. Her post came right after sinner finished a long and tough tennis season in turin.

Article Title: Hollywood actress receives touching compliment from Magic Johnson after posing for a photo at star-studded event
Article Text:
Magic Johnson. Magic Johnson/X

Magic Johnson’s shared heartfelt messages after attending Ripple of Hope Awards gala



Magic Johnson praises his team and relives an emotional backstage moment



Kennedy Human Rights enters a new era amid leadership changes



Magic Johnson’s appearance at the 2025 Robert F. Kennedy Human Rights Center Ripple of Hope Awards turned into one of the most talked-about moments of the night. The NBA legend was honored for his advocacy. On top of that, a warm exchange with a Hollywood actress drew attention online. The gala was held in New York City, bringing out entertainers, activists, and industry leaders was star-studded. After the event, Johnson shared his thoughts on the night in a series of posts on X.The basketball icon shared that the ceremony was historic. The award aligned with the 100th birthday of Robert F. Kennedy. Johnson’s posts captured the sense of community in the room, and the support he received from friends, colleagues, and attendees, including the actress he posed with.Magic Johnson showered gratitude to actress Alfre Woodard for introducing him, writing, "I want to thank my beautiful sister, actress Alfre Woodard, for introducing me at last night’s Robert F. Kennedy Ripple of Hope Awards! It was also great to see actor Glenn Davis at the event!"Johnson went to share his thoughts on receiving the Ripple of Hope Award, sharing, "This morning I’m still taking in what a magical moment it was to receive the 2025 Robert F.Kennedy Human Rights Center Ripple of Hope Award on his 100th birthday was something I will cherish forever." Johnson further revealed about receiving the honor alongside Martin Cabrera Jr., Stephen Colbert, and Darren Walker.He continued, "I’ve dedicated my life to be a voice for the voiceless and today I’m humbled, grateful, and inspired to keep showing up with compassion, courage, and purpose."Johnson also acknowledged the people behind his business ventures, writing a full message of appreciation that included partners from JLC Infrastructure, SodexoMagic, Equitrust, and Magic Johnson Enterprises. He emphasized how much it meant to have them present.Another moment stood out for him as he recalled leaving the stage: "After I stepped off the stage at the Ripple of Hope Gala and went through the back of the house, the incredible hotel service men and women were preparing to serve the guests and stopped to give me a standing ovation."The event also marked a turning point for the organization. Kerry Kennedy announced that Robert F. Kennedy Human Rights will now operate as the Robert & Ethel Kennedy Human Rights Center. She shared her pride in the rebrand and her decision to step down as president in 2026 while remaining active on the Board.Kennedy stated, "As I begin my final year at the helm, my heart is full. I am overwhelmed with excitement and pride as we embrace our new name." Joe Kennedy and Frank Baker will lead the Board as co-chairs, guiding the organization’s next chapter.The gala drew nearly 1,000 attendees, including Robert De Niro, Dolores Huerta, Mark Hamill, and Governor Janet Mills.Also Read: Jaylen Brown autograph chase turns wild as determined fan fights through crowd to reach Celtics star
Article Summary: Magic johnson attended the 2025 robert f. kennedy human rights center ripple of hope awards. The gala was held in new york city, bringing out entertainers, activists, and industry leaders. The basketball icon shared his thoughts on the night in a series of posts on x.

Article Title: Father Time 2025 showdown: Are Connor McDavid, Jordan Binnington, and NHL stars finally slowing down?
Article Text:
Connor McDavid (Image Via Twitter)

How Connor McDavid, J.T. Miller, and more are showing signs of decline in 2025

8 Minutes of J.T. Miller Highlight-Reel Plays

In this judgment, Father Time reflects on an NHL player’s performance evaluation between 2022-2025, taking into consideration The Athletic’s criteria of the player’s age (28–32), total period of no major injuries, and continuous decline in the statistics, as well as All-Star and contract of the players won’t weaken their case. This time, alongside Connor McDavid, Jordan Binnington, J.T. Miller, Filip Forsberg, and Linus Ullmark, analysts question whether the said stars’ stats reflect natural aging or just temporary troubles.Such cases are not really about panic, but rather they are pointing out some patterns in the related area of Usage, minutes, systems, and team performance. All these factors working together provide a clearer view of which players' struggles are only for a short time and which ones can be part of longer-term trajectories.It's J.T. Miller (Rangers) who is facing the most significant drop, going down from a 91-point pace in Vancouver to a 51-point projection this season. The Athletic mentions a decline in power-play production and fewer primary assists as major reasons for the decrease. His side, however, claims that Mikey Sullivan’s low-event system and his health problems are the main factors that affect his numbers. The judgment: there are indications of decline, but not enough to declare his high-end impact extinct.Jordan Binnington (Blues) comes into the picture with the lowest goals-above-expected number in the whole league. The prosecution brings forward various bad performances, while the defense states that St. Louis' issues and his historically over- and underperforming nature are factors contributing to the decline trend. The decision: significant drop, but still able to stabilize through a stronger second half.Connor McDavid (Oilers) surprises the most. Although the overall scoring is at the highest level, his 5-on-5 production is at the lowest in his career. The Athletic points out a consistent decline over the last five years in primary chances, shots, and possession metrics. His defense asserts that these circumstances are mainly due to heavy minutes and constant line rotations. The verdict: not an even-strength giant as before, but still very much a capable and top-level team.Filip Forsberg (Predators) seems to be the most affected player as he feels the negative impact of reduced power-play utilization and cannot find suitable words to explain the slowed-down bursts of speed. His defense claims that it is Nashville's weak power play that has been hindering his numbers from growing higher. The verdict: team-inflicted slow down rather than loss of personal skills.Linus Ullmark (Senators) has a tough time with his save percentage and is regularly caught in highly dangerous situations from which he will eventually get shot at. His camp is adamant that it is only a temporary setback. The ruling: the bar has been lowered, but still not so that one can’t hope for improvement.According to The Athletic’s ratings, the decline of any of these athletes is not necessarily by all means. There are some alarming signs that accompany each case, but allow for a recovery as well. The 2025 season is a decisive one—a comeback or giving Time That Father half a year of stronger proof next year.Also Read: Why was Max Domi left out vs. the Washington Capitals, and will he get another chance this weekend?
Article Summary: Connor mcdavid, jordan binnington, j.t. Miller, filip forsberg, and linus ullmark are showing signs of decline in 2025. The athletic’s ratings, the decline of any of these athletes is not necessarily by all means. There are some alarming signs that accompany each case, but allow for a recovery as well.

Article Title: Mike Evans injury update: Buccaneers hint at WR’s condition for Thursday night against the Falcons as losing streak looms large
Article Text:
Mike Evans suffered a brutal collarbone injury.(Image via Vincent Carchietta-Imagn Images)

Tampa Bay Buccaneers share Mike Evans’ recovery progress as the team faces a tough time



Tampa Bay Buccaneers face a tough stretch without Mike Evans



Mike Evans, the Tampa Bay Buccaneers’ star player, has been missing from the field for the last few weeks as the team records an average performance in this season.As the Tampa Bay Buccaneers gear up to face the Atlanta Falcons on Thursday night, the team has opened up about Mike Evans’ progress and a possible return timeline.A few hours ago, the Tampa Bay Buccaneers’ head coach, Todd Bowles opened up about Mike Evans and Tristan Wirfs.The popular head coach said, “Short week, but they did not play Sunday, so we will continue to work them in and we will see where we are on Wednesday…”But that’s not all; popular NFL insider FOX’s Greg Auman has reported that Mike Evans was a limited participant on both Monday and Tuesday’s practice sessions as the team gears up to face the Atlanta Falcons on Thursday night.This has sparked hope that Mike Evans might return to the field on Thursday as the Tampa Bay Buccaneers experience a pretty challenging time on the field.However, neither the team, the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, nor Mike Evans has confirmed whether he would be able to take the field on Thursday night to face the Atlanta Falcons.For the unversed, the team’s popular wide receiver sustained a pretty brutal injury to his collarbone and suffered a broken clavicle in Week 7.Mike Evans has not returned to the field since then until he became a limited participant last week.While many fans were expecting Mike Evans to take the field in Week 14 after he returned as a limited participant, the Tampa Bay Buccaneers ultimately ruled him out.As Mike Evans focuses on his recovery, the team is experiencing a tough stretch on the field.In the last five matches, the Tampa Bay Buccaneers have only managed to win once as the team witnessed brutal losses against the New England Patriots, the Buffalo Bills, the Los Angeles Rams and the New Orleans Saints.As the team gears up to face the Atlanta Falcons on Thursday night, all eyes are on Mike Evans’ potential return to the field.Also Read: Anthony Richardson injury update: Indianapolis Colts break silence on QB's status for Seahawks matchup amid tough stretch
Article Summary: Tampa bay buccaneers share mike evans’ recovery progress as the team faces a tough time on the field. Mike evans suffered a brutal collarbone injury and a broken clavicle in week 7. The wide receiver has not returned to the field since then until he became a limited participant last week.
